<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.30</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Current state of given Scud launcher. Following states are recognized: 

*0 - No activity  
*1 - Launch preparation, 
*2 - Launch prepared
*3 - Ignition  
*4 - Launched.
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>  '''scudState''' scudName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> scudName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (([[scudState]] _scud) == 3) [[exitWith]] 
{ 
  [[player]] [[sideChat]] "SCUD Launch status: Missile Ignition";
};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 10:58
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">
This command checks the scud status (Non-integral values are used to indicate transition between states).
To make the scud be upright, launch or cancel launch you need to use actions.
<code>scud1 [[action]] ["scudLaunch",scud1]; // erect the missile
scud1 [[action]] ["scudStart",scud1]; // launch the missile
scud1 [[action]] ["scudCancel",scud1]; // down the missile
</code>
(Make sure either the scud launcher has a crew inside or you use the game logic to perform actions).
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
